channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Bad Moms
channel.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mums, Amy, Carla and Kiki, decide to go wild after ditching their daily routines.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Skiptrace
channel.desc: Bennie Chan, a detective from Hong Kong, joins hands with an American gambler, as they strive together to defeat a Chinese criminal.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
channel.desc: After a genetically altered spider bites him, Peter Parker develops superhuman abilities and confronts a humanoid reptilian creature.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Curse of the Golden Flower
channel.desc: Emperor Ping and Empress Phoenix plot to seize the kingdom's control for themselves and eliminate the other. However, their power struggle leads to deathly consequences for the royal family.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
channel.desc: Megan, a former police officer who works in a morgue, is tasked with moving a disfigured body. However, she sees terrifying visions that make her suspect that the corpse is possessed by a demon.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Intruder
channel.desc: Scott and Annie move into a new house after their wedding. Soon enough, they discover that the man they bought the property from is keeping a close watch on them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Once Upon a Time... In Hollywood
channel.desc: Rick, a fading actor, and Cliff, his stunt double, struggle to find relevant work in Hollywood and go through various twists and turns in order to restart their careers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: America's Sweethearts
channel.desc: When Kiki helps facilitate a final public appearance between her famous boss and her estranged husband, she experiences an unexpected spark of attraction and falls for him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Matilda
channel.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Sicario
channel.desc: When the war against drugs escalates at the border of the USA and Mexico, an impractical FBI agent gets commissioned by the government, where she is exposed to harsh truths.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
channel.desc: Megan, a former police officer who works in a morgue, is tasked with moving a disfigured body. However, she sees terrifying visions that make her suspect that the corpse is possessed by a demon.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Shadow in the Cloud
channel.desc: A WWII pilot is assigned a secret mission to travel with confidential documents on a Boeing B-17 Flying Fortress. However, she soon has to deal with an evil presence on board.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Backstabbing for Beginners
channel.desc: Michael, a young United Nations employee, is shocked when he discovers a scandalous global conspiracy involving the murder of his predecessor.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Caller
channel.desc: Mary, a divorcee, discovers an antique telephone and sets it up in her new apartment. However, things get complicated when she receives mysterious and disturbing phone calls from the past.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: A Chinese Tall Story
channel.desc: A Buddhist monk searches for lost scriptures, but his quest takes an unexpected turn when he rescues an exiled princess. Now, he must balance his original mission with protecting her.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Walk
channel.desc: Philippe Petit, a French street performer, dreams of performing daring stunts. He attempts to walk between the Twin Towers of the World Trade Center in New York on a tightrope.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Spotlight
channel.desc: Martin Baron joins the Boston Globe as an editor and pushes four journalists to pursue a story about the child molestation charges against the local church.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Life
channel.desc: As astronauts discover the first evidence of extra-terrestrial life on Mars, they begin realising that the life form is extremely intelligent and hostile.
